lead_paragraph: PEREIRA--Dr. Milton Alan, May 15, 2016. Devoted father to David, Emily and Katherine. Loving grandfather to Lanie and Talia. Dedicated psychiatrist who loved his work and helped many. He will be greatly missed. Go Blue! 1/3
